Method Detail

detectJoinpoints

public static List<JoinPoint> detectJoinpoints(org.eclipse.emf.common.util.URI pointcutMURI,
                                               org.eclipse.emf.common.util.URI baseMURI)
Detects the joinpoints for the pointcut and base model at the given URIs and returns them. The execution is performed by the registered mandatory and unique extension of the JoinpointDetector extension point. Throws a RuntimeException if no extension or more than one extensions are registered.

Parameters:
pointcutMURI - the URI of the pointcut model
baseMURI - the URI of the base model
Returns:
a list containing all detected join points
